title: Huge 1200sq ft (2) Bedroom Apartment DELEADED
posting_body: **Very nice Sun Drenched oversized 1,200 Sq Ft
**2 bedroom apartment on 1st floor.
Deleaded Unit
**Tall Ceilings make apt feel extra spacious
** Newer Granite kitchen Fully applianced with Dishwasher, Stove, Frigerator.
Features Lovely open floor plan into living room/ formal dining room.
2 generous sized Bedrooms w/Hardwood Flooring
Formal dining room (ceiling fan)
Living Room (ceiling fan)
Private In Unit Laundry hook up (bring your machines/photo with checkered floor).
Bathroom has a full tub, tile floor, granite counter.
Unit has high efficiency water heater & heating system, also the home has blown in insulation.
2 Designated off street parking spots.
Close to train about 3/4 mile, Town park and center of town is a stones throw away.
$2225.00 a month plus utilities.
Will need first/last/security totaling $6675 to move in.
Tenant responsible for gas, electric, and cable.
Owner pays for water, sewer, and trash pickup.
Will do credit/Cori checks.
The perfect applicants would be quiet and courtesy in order fit in with the existing 2 amazing tenants.
No SMOKING On premises.
Pets Considered.
Unit Available October 15th
PLEASE EMAIL me a personalized note so that i know you are not a Bot and your phone number if you wish for me to call you directly.
